title: How do I delete call records?
answer:
l   Deleting call records:

On the dialer, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208140948634001.png) **>** **Delete call log**.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208140950792002.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208140951105003.jpg) 

l   Deleting one call record:

Touch and hold the call record you want to delete, and touch **Delete entry**.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208140951936004.jpg)

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208140952623005.png)

The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
